entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING , Saint Andrews
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:01 AM AST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 5.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Point Lepreau 10:00 AM AST Friday 13 January 2023
Temperature: 5.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.8 kPa falling
Humidity: 96 %
Dewpoint: 5.1°C
Wind: ESE 29 km/h gust 38 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Friday: Rain at times heavy or snow. High 11.
entry.summary: Snow changing to rain at times heavy this morning. Fog patches developing this morning. Rainfall amount 30 to 40 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming south 40 gusting to 60 except gusting to 80 along the coast this morning and early this afternoon. High 11. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of rain. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of rain. Fog patches. Amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light near midnight. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A few showers. Temperature falling to minus 3 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: A few rain showers ending late in the afternoon then cloudy. Risk of freezing rain. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Rainfall amount 5 mm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature falling to minus 3 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Friday 13 January 2023
